name: Soul Carver
description:
[Made for Newbie Game Jam 2 with the theme DEATH = PROGRESS]

Form a polite little creature by carving it out from a flaming ball of soul matter! There are five (random) possibilities. Can you create them all?

Note: High score and unlocked creatures don't save because...I didn't have time to learn how to make saves! Sorry!

Controls:

  • Left/right arrow keys or A/D to move
  • Space to jump/stay afloat

Tips:

  • Touching the sides for too long will kill you
  • Make sure your soul isn't leaning too far to either color when you die
  • Stay alive for at least 60 seconds, then die to progress to the next stage

Music and SFX from Pixabay, Freesound, and Zapsplat
